compute_mps_nofb.json_critique: Gives all required info but embeds verbose implementation details (write_* functions) that are irrelevant to reading the cube, making the task more prescriptive than necessary.
halo_filtered_grafic_fiducial.json_criti: Overall clear but omits concrete field names / units for R_vir and particle coordinates in the catalogue, leaving some ambiguity for reproduction.
compute_mps.json_critique: Well-specified; minor redundancy with repeated format description yet still concise enough.
compute_mps_dmo.json_critique: Like the NoFB counterpart, slightly over-detailed about binary layout but otherwise complete.
compare_mps_nofb2dmo.json_critique: Instruction conflict: task title and body refer to NoFeedback but the return-value sentence asks for Fiducial ratio, causing ambiguity in required output.
generate_grafic_cubes.json_critique: Provides path and general format but lacks specification of secondary header content and snapshot fields, so an expert could reproduce but with some trial and error.
paper_critique: Task suite covers key analyses and is mostly reproducible, but several tasks repeat unnecessary code excerpts and one task contains contradictory instructions, indicating moderate but not perfect writing quality.
paper_title: Stirring the cosmic pot: how black hole feedback shapes the matter power spectrum in the FABLE simulations
